api.name: Get_Attraction_Reviews
api.func_description: Retrieves user reviews and ratings for a specific attraction, supporting pagination to browse through large review sets.

id.description: id can be retrieved from api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Attraction collection as id inside products (data->products->id)

required.query: I'm planning to visit the Eiffel Tower and would like to see some recent reviews from other visitors. Can you help me find them?

response.content: guide Dawood very professionanl including language proficiency
Eye opener in terms of experience. Rameez, the guide, was exceptional

optional.query: I'm planning to visit the Eiffel Tower and would like to see some recent reviews from other visitors. The attraction ID is PR6K7ZswbGBs. Can you show me the reviews on the first page?

response.content: guide Dawood very professionanl including language proficiency
Eye opener in terms of experience. Rameez, the guide, was exceptional

required.content: guide Dawood very professionanl including language proficiency
Eye opener in terms of experience. Rameez, the guide, was exceptional
Sehr informative Tour mit einem phantastischen Reiseleiter, der sehr zuvorkommend agierte. Top.
Özellikle Dhobi Ghat deneyimi çok iyiydi
One of those experiences that will live long in the memory. If i ever return to Mumbai I would do it again. Amazing.
Maze and Raneez were amazing guides very knowledgable , professional with some humour in too. I would highly recommend this tour .
Ganesh was terrific and the tour very informative. All three sites were must-sees. The train rides were an additional treat
Super tour - well worth doing but expect the unusual
This tour was very interesting and informative. It is a must, when you are in Mumbai.

Group of 8 people, Lucky took good care of us, explanations were clear and complete, showed us how people live in that area, traveled by train… one of the best experiences in 15 days in India. Highly recommended!

It was a wonderful experience.  The guide was exceptional in that he was very thorough, friendly and very helpful.  He even found time to speak to my taxi driver to direct him to my pick up location after the tour.
The tour itself gave us an insight into the workings of the dubbawalas, the workings of dhobi ghat and the scenes at Dharawi.
It’s a very interesting and informative tour. Rameez is a great guide: knowledgeable, kind, and always ready to answer our questions. I really recommend this tour.

**A Truly Eye-Opening and Heartwarming Experience!** Our guided tour of Dharavi, Dhobighat, and the Mumbai Dabbawallas was nothing short of extraordinary. From start to finish, it was a humbling and deeply fascinating journey into the heart of Mumbai’s vibrant and resilient communities. Our guide, Abi, was absolutely lovely and made the experience unforgettable. His warmth, knowledge, and passion for sharing the stories of his community were truly inspiring. One of the most touching moments of the tour was when Abi invited us to see his own home and introduced us to his wonderful mum. It was such a personal and genuine gesture that gave us a rare glimpse into the daily lives of the people who live in Mumbai’s slums. Abi’s pride in his community and his openness in sharing his story was incredibly moving. The tour itself was a powerful testament to the resourcefulness, ingenuity, and determination of the vast numbers of people who call Mumbai’s slums home. From the bustling energy of Dharavi—where small-scale industries thrive—to the remarkable efficiency of the Dabbawallas and the mesmerizing sight of Dhobighat, every moment was filled with awe and admiration for the people who make this city what it is. This tour was not just about sightseeing; it was about understanding and appreciating the human spirit. It left us with a profound respect for the resilience and creativity of those who navigate life in such challenging circumstances. We walked away with a new perspective and a deep sense of gratitude. If you’re visiting Mumbai, this tour is an absolute must. Thank you, Abi, for making it such a meaningful and memorable experience. You are a true ambassador for your community, and we feel so lucky to have had the chance to learn from you! ---

I took this tour on my first morning in Mumbai and am so glad I did. Our guide was brilliant - funny, informative, helpful - and his tour was a perfect introduction to this fascinating city. And if you haven’t ridden a local train in Mumbai and would like some company for your first trip, this tour has that too. I’m also fairly confident you will come away from Dharavi with a much more nuanced view than you went in with. Thoroughly recommended :0)

Is part of Mumbay life; difficult to see and tray to understand this huge city without Dharawi. Incredible number of (very) hard working people there! And, for our parameter, hard life conditions (water, power, and foremost scarce space!): but people there holds together. Many thanks to the knowledgeable and competent guide!
Great to have a look at and learn about these interesting local Mumbai areas with a knowledgeable guide. The train rides were quite an experience too.

Excellent guide. It was informative and eye-opening. One of the highlights of our trip to Mumbai. My teenage kids were concerned about going, but Dawood put us at ease and they were so pleased that they went. Highly recommend.

This tour englobing the Dharavi Slum, DhobiGhat and the Dabbawallas allowed us to see a different aspect of Mumbai, especially that of hard working people in an environment which we would not have imagined. We also got a chance to take different means of transport, which in itself was an experience.  Our guide Loki was great.  Having lived in the area, he was able to share direct local knowledge which made the tour very interesting. We would highly recommend this tour with Loki.

The tour is good because of the fact that it shows 5% of the true slums. Even though be aware that the guides are not really from the slums and that there’s a lot of corrupcy involved from the government. To show western people something they think is the slums. To make us feel grateful. Not everything the tourguides tell is true.
This was a fantastic experience. Altho basically a walking tour, we hopped on a train between sights and tuk tusks. Guide was very professional, friendly and helpful.
It was an incredible experience and we had a great and very professional guide

Es war eine sehr gute Tour  der Führer war ebenfalls super; Ursprünglich wollte ich wegen des Fremdschämens nicht die Slums besuchen. Aber keine Angst, es ist und kommt anders als man denkt...
Unbedingt empfehlenswert!
Tour guide provided detail explanation on each place and activity we observed. Activities included visiting Dharavi, Dabbawalla, and Dobi Ghat by train and walking. Will recommend the tour to anyone.

Riding the local rails to get from site to site was amazing! At each site we learned so much! Loki  who used to live in Dharavi was excellent at explaining the uniqueness of life in the slum and how the slum is an actual economic powerhouse. So important to see!

This was my second tour with the same company (Amaze Tours) and both were great experiences. Both guides were professional and informative but fun at the same time. The visit to Dharavi, the laundry and Dabbawallahs was a full on trip, using trains & taxi to whisk us around to each element, which added to the whole experience. Highly recommend tour and a 5 star service from guide Amaze.

Our guide Ramiz was excellent. He was knowledegable, helpful and thoughtful. I definitely recomend him. The experience itself was amazing. The tour included 4 important points of Mumbai's life and culture. Something that you can't see on your own that easily.
We had a superb guide in Dinesh! He gave us an amazing experience and great insights into life in the Dharavi slum. Highly recommend
The best and most knowledgeable guide you could ask for. From start to finish, this was a first class experience.
Ganesh was fantastic. He was very attentive and informative Very good experience and would recommend highly

An amazing experience on this particular tour. Maze, our tour guide was superb with his service and came with heaps of information and history learnt. Well done. It's been a great outing. Cheers. Steve
Iets dat iemand moet weten en met je eigen ogen zien Is een aanrader

Our tour guide was very attentive and knowledgeable 
The areas he took us were amazing and jaw dropping 
His friendliness was above and beyond 
We as a couple enjoyed the other 4 persons on this tour and shared many experiences here in India 
Absolutely would recommend this to all.

I would say this is a 'must do' tour. It encompasses so many aspects of Mumbai 'life'. Beginning with the grandeur of the Gate of India and surrounding Victorian buildings to the densely populated locality of Dharavi (slum) travel is by train and bus - with all tickets taken care of by the Guide. Along the way, information is shared about the city of Mumbai - development, history, character, business and general life. My guide, Dawood, was excellent. Well worth the price and time. Book it!

Lockesh was very knowledgeable and was able to guide us throughout the trip. The experience if taking public transport was so much fun that we are able to experience journey like the locals. The only unfortuate thing is not able to see the dabbawallas as our tour was on a Sunday. Highly recommended!
I had a great trip to the slum area. My guide Lokesh was very informative, knowledgeable and considerate. Highly recommend this tour

Tour de 4h très intéressant avec un guide très sympa et prévenant. Seul bémol : je pense que la visite de la Gateway of India peut se faire en solo...D'ailleurs les 4 participants l'avaient déjà vue. Cela laisserait plus de temps pour les visites du Dabbawallah, passionnante organisation de service de lunchboxes, le Dharavi & surtout le Dhobi ghat, grand système de laverie à ciel ouvert. Visites passionnantes & très bien organisées.

Dawood was a wonderful guide and the opportunity to use public transport was much appreciated. The visit to the slum was most enlightening and Dawood's passion and positivity about this community was very refreshing. It certainly challenged the many stereotypes we see in mainstream media. A fantastic experience!

Our guest was wonderful! He shared so much of his knowledge with us. We had such a good time in Dharavi seeing the different manufacturing. The only problem that I had was the secondary tour guide of Dhobi Ghat was really difficult for me to understand but I think I walked away understanding the majority. I would absolutely recommend this tour to anyone considering it.
I enjoyed riding the local transportation, the bus and the train. Our guide was great. His tour of the slums was especially educational as was the laundry.
Great experience. Very knowledgeable tour guide. Would 100% recommend. Good value for money. Wouldn’t see any of it on my own.

From start to finish Lucky the guide was very informative and professional.
Amazing insight to many cultures and lifestyles. How the people of Dharavri adapt and work amazing. The dhobighats real eye opening experience
 The sites schools and many many other things seen along the route just amazing . Our guide totally top rated could not fault a single thing from meeting him to trains buses taxis and tours . Brilliant trip.

From start to finish, it was a humbling and deeply fascinating journey into the heart of Mumbai’s vibrant and resilient communities. One of the most touching moments of the tour was when Abi invited us to see his own home and introduced us to his wonderful mum. It was such a personal and genuine gesture that gave us a rare glimpse into the daily lives of the people who live in Mumbai’s slums. Abi’s pride in his community and his openness in sharing his story was incredibly moving. The tour itself was a powerful testament to the resourcefulness, ingenuity, and determination of the vast numbers of people who call Mumbai’s slums home. This tour was not just about sightseeing; it was about understanding and appreciating the human spirit. It left us with a profound respect for the resilience and creativity of those who navigate life in such challenging circumstances. We walked away with a new perspective and a deep sense of gratitude. If you’re visiting Mumbai, this tour is an absolute must. Thank you, Abi, for making it such a meaningful and memorable experience. You are a true ambassador for your community, and we feel so lucky to have had the chance to learn from you! ---
